description: This file serves as the bundle entry point for the Vite preview server in a Qwik application. It imports necessary modules, such as QwikCity middleware, plan, and server-side rendering code, and exports a configured QwikCity instance for serving the app in production mode.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Creates and configures the QwikCity application instance with provided options such as render function and plan.
